name: picnicker
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who is having a picnic (= an informal meal outside): It was still warm, and very quiet; all the day's picnickers had gone home. Picnickers sit and watch children climb beautiful old trees. See
picnic
More examplesFewer examplesPicnickers are welcome on the grounds before or after the performances.We welcome picnickers at the site, but ask that you take all your litter away with you.In summer, weekend picnickers and campers spread across the hillside.
